definition: abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Jie3 fang4 jun1
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4
containing_words.word: 中国人民政治协商会议

definition: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

sentences.english: I only brought my passport and the Foreign Employment License.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了护照和外国人就业证。

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街头仅走了一小段路来寻找其他的外国人。

sentences.english: Overseas chinese are bring into foreigners since 2000.
sentences.chinese: 从2000年起，华侨并入外国人统计。

sentences.english: Everywhere we went, the French were grand to us.
sentences.chinese: 我们到处受到法国人的热情接待。

sentences.english: He could not get a hare again; instead he was laughed at by the people of Song.
sentences.chinese: 兔子他再也得不到，他自己反倒被宋国人嘲笑了。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。

sentences.english: It is not just foreigners who worry.
sentences.chinese: 担心这个问题的不仅是外国人。

sentences.english: The commerce affects our people’s life in so many ways.
sentences.chinese: 这一贸易往来在很多方面影响了两国人民的生活。

sentences.english: The latter will move back, watching to the Englishman.
sentences.chinese: 后者将回迁，看向英国人。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: The great friendship and militant solidarity between the peoples of our two countries are unbreakable.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国人民的伟大友谊与战斗团结是坚不可摧的。

sentences.english: Many foreigners now go to Hanshan Temple to celebrate Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 现在有许多外国人也去寒山寺庆祝春节。

sentences.english: Blame was attached upon Prime Minister Laughton's Cabinet for yielding to the Russians.
sentences.chinese: 劳顿首相的内阁因向俄国人屈服而受到责难。

sentences.english: I was later told that the dogs in Jinping had been barking at the foreigner running in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人告诉我，金平的狗见了外国人会叫个不停。

sentences.english: Usual Englishman or Englishwoman can indicate the road for you on the street.
sentences.chinese: 通常英国人在街上是会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Bernd- Schneider : Actually with everyone, but with the Germans the best.
sentences.chinese: 事实上和每个人都很好，但和德国人相处得最好。

definition: the masses/the great bulk of the population/popular (of music, science etc)
Celestial Empire, tributary title conferred on imperial China/Taiping Heavenly Kingdom
proletariat/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4] plus masses/also written 無產階級|无产阶级[wu2 chan3 jie1 ji2] in PRC Marxist theory
ordinary people/the "person in the street"/CL:個|个[ge4]
